attributes.action: Cease support for Turkish entry into the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically this is a no brainer - Turkey is not a European Country and never will be, and the European Union by definition is for European Countries. On top of that the cultural, and in particular, religous differences create a divide that will always be too big to bridge.  The US wants this because it wants to keep US bases in Turkey, and the UK wants this as we are a US poodle, and to dilute the EU into a trading block rather than a large nation state. And anyway Europe has enough seriously dissaffected muslims without taking in another 60 million

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
